text: ninṟe janataye iruṭṭukaḷil ninn veḷiccattilēkk keāṇṭ varikayuṁ, allāhuvinṟe (anugrahattinṟe) nāḷukaḷeppaṟṟi avare ōrmippikkukayuṁ ceyyuka enn nirdēśiccukeāṇṭ mūsāye nam'muṭe dr̥ṣṭāntaṅṅaḷumāyi nāṁ ayakkukayuṇṭāyi. tikañña kṣamāśīlamuḷḷavaruṁ ēṟe nandiyuḷḷavarumāya ellāvarkkuṁ atil dr̥ṣṭāntaṅṅaḷuṇṭ‌. tīrcca
